website_summaries.verdict: These fit tightly into an outlet and are tough for baby to remove.
pros: A 32-pack provides enough covers for most homes
White color blends well with white outlets
Does not interfere with other items plugged into the other side of the outlet
cons: They fit so tightly, you will need to pry a bit to get them lose when you need to access your plugs

customer_reviews.title: Was good but
customer_reviews.text: Update 01-18-19: I don't recommend this design. My one year old is using her teeth to assist with removing these because of the design for easy removal by "us". I recommend purchase a flat design that you have to pry off. Current I have gorilla tape out the outlet with the covers still installed. This is more effective at the moment. original review: It's easy to use but a little tough to come out which can be a good thing because it is hard for you, it will definitely be difficult for you kid
customer_reviews.author: GCPhotographers

customer_reviews.title: I use these in my vacation rental for safety
customer_reviews.text: I don’t know what kind of outlets people are putting these in that they are falling out so easily. These stay in place nicely but are not too difficult to remove. You do have to tug on them so little ones are probably unable to remove them on their own.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Work great!
customer_reviews.text: These work well...are tight in the outlet but not too hard to pull out for an adult. I like ones that aren’t clear...these are opaque white so baby can’t see the holes and still want to explore.
customer_reviews.author: D. Cox

customer_reviews.title: Does the job.
customer_reviews.text: Keeps dust and unwanted objects out of unused wall outlets, extension cords outlets, and unused surge protector outlets.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel M. Hart

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Having a toddler with a growing urge to explore everything made this purchase necessary! The covers are very good quality and will not break easily! They are very easy to install, but cannot be removed easily by little fingers (those attached to my toddler). Overall, these are a great deal for the money, you won’t be disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: BWoodfin

customer_reviews.title: Perfect way to baby proof
customer_reviews.text: We just started baby proofing and these are wonderful. They look good, as good as a plug cover can, and arent super easy to remove (my nephews actually figured out how to remove other ones). Very happy, would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Connolly

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: What can go wrong with these? Not much. Getting the house all baby proofed. Product works great.
customer_reviews.author: Jay byma

customer_reviews.title: Nice and firm in the outlet
customer_reviews.text: My daughter won’t be pulling these out, they are snugged in nice.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Baby proof
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my son have to baby proof the house 😊 they work great fit right into the plug lay flat . And are good quality , plus they come with 32 !
customer_reviews.author: Evangelina morales

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, and hard for removal-exactly what you want in outlet covers for children!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, and hard for removal-exactly what you want in outlet covers for children!
customer_reviews.author: Abbey F

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size.
customer_reviews.text: Great size protection for kids. The size is just right to cover the plug and not affecting the other one that is occupied. Also hard to pull out, especially for kids.
customer_reviews.author: Shen Wang

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and function!
customer_reviews.text: This is what I wanted. These plugs are not easy to pull out, so it is almost impossible for the kids to pull.
customer_reviews.author: Muhammad Sohail Khan

customer_reviews.title: Super Snug
customer_reviews.text: These outlet covers fit very snug in the outlet. There is no way my baby is getting these out, which puts my mind at ease. I thought these were going to be clear but they were white (I didn't pay close enough attention when ordering). I actually like the white a lot becuase my sockets are white so it blends really nicely and doesn't scream "babyproofing!".
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

product_meta.title: Outlet Plug Covers - Ucio 32-Pack Child Proof Electrical Protector Safety Caps Protect Toddlers and Babies Safe & Secure Electric Plug Protectors
feature_bullets: ☛Prevent Accidental Electric Shock - The plug covers are build just for the kids who play with the wall socket plugs and avoid the risk of electrical shock. Perfect for electrical sockets, wall outlets and plugs.
☛Easy to Install–Completely easy to install, simply slide socket covers into the socket plug and they’re ready to go.

☛Safe and Hazard-Free Environment–These electrical outlet plug covers are built with safety in mind. Their standard size means they work on most American outlets. Once they’re in place, simply slide the plate and plug your devices in. Babies on the other hand are not able to do this so you don’t have to worry about their safety.

☛Power Outlet Cover with An Automatic Closing Mechanism– The Ucio set of 32 child proof safety electrical protection covers are super easy to use. A sliding mechanism will closes automatically and stay in place. Even better, each piece is designed from durable ABS material that lasts long so you get maximum value for money.

☛Durable & Convenient Protector Covers, 100% Guarantee – You get a pack of 32 electrical safety caps that are waterproof and dust-proof. Keep your home safe and protect your kids from the risk of electrical shock. Comes with 30-day money back and a 12-month limited seller's guarantee against manufacturer defects from date of purchased!
